tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE NanoscaleDevicesEfficiency (device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
manufacture_date DATE,
material_used VARCHAR(50),
efficiency_rating FLOAT,
designer_name VARCHAR(100),
research_group VARCHAR(100))

CREATE TABLE research_project (
    project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    researcher_name VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE research_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    researcher VARCHAR(50),
    experiment_date DATE,
    results TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE DeviceSpecs (
    device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    manufacturer TEXT,
    model TEXT,
    year INT,
    nanoscale_technology TEXT
);
